title: The Democrats Are Panicking Over This (Ep 1750)
description:
The Libs are melting down! In this episode, I address the panic over this blockbuster legal decision, and their growing anxiety over the 2022 election. 

News Picks:

The Democrats have a Hispanic voter support problem.


Clown Taylor Lorenz faceplants in one of the greatest self owns in social media history. 


The “fact-checker” clown show continues. 

The mask mandate gets shredded.

Libs shocked to find out that gun “buybacks” don’t work.


Male testosterone levels have been declining for decades.
